rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
医院每天刷牙与肺炎病例和 ICU 死亡率大幅下降有关研究表明，每天刷牙可显着降低医院获得性肺炎 (HAP) 的发病率，尤其是机械通气患者，从而缩短 ICU 停留时间并降低 ICU 死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Daily-toothbrushing-in-hospitals-linked-to-significant-drop-in-pneumonia-cases-and-ICU-mortality-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Daily-toothbrushing-in-hospitals-linked-to-significant-drop-in-pneumonia-cases-and-ICU-mortality-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab6643bc-a05c-4413-aa6c-74ff9efb179d Tue, 19 Dec 2023 19:17:00 -0500 Daily toothbrushing in hospitals linked to significant drop in pneumonia cases and ICU mortality rates
使用视网膜图像的人工智能模型在诊断自闭症方面实现了完美的准确性研究表明，使用高分辨率视网膜图像的深度集成模型 (DEM) 可以准确诊断儿童自闭症谱系障碍 (ASD)，ASD 检测的 AUROC 为 1.00，估计 ASD 严重程度的 AUROC 为 0.74，为计算机辅助诊断提供了一种有前途的方法。自闭症谱系障碍诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/AI-models-using-retinal-images-achieve-perfect-accuracy-in-diagnosing-autism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/AI-models-using-retinal-images-achieve-perfect-accuracy-in-diagnosing-autism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ab8c1f8-da56-47fe-9a8a-4c0ba3436b0c Tue, 19 Dec 2023 18:58:00 -0500 AI models using retinal images achieve perfect accuracy in diagnosing autism
菜单上的营养标签带来更健康的选择，最多可减少 25% 的卡路里研究分析了 Taco Bell 餐厅 9 年的数据，显示营养菜单标签使每次交易的卡路里减少了 22-25%，支持 2010 年美国患者保护和平价医疗法案在促进健康饮食方面的有效性选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Nutritional-labels-on-menus-lead-to-healthier-choices-cutting-calories-by-up-to-2525.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Nutritional-labels-on-menus-lead-to-healthier-choices-cutting-calories-by-up-to-2525.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a63505f1-5bab-4e7c-993f-3d93665c038e Tue, 19 Dec 2023 18:37:00 -0500 Nutritional labels on menus lead to healthier choices, cutting calories by up to 25%
人工智能驱动的电子皮肤技术进步有望带来健康监测和诊断的革命评论讨论了人工智能在开发下一代电子皮肤中的集成，重点关注人机界面和疾病诊断应用中的工程挑战、信号处理和健康数据分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/AI-driven-advancements-in-electronic-skin-technology-promise-revolution-in-health-monitoring-and-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/AI-driven-advancements-in-electronic-skin-technology-promise-revolution-in-health-monitoring-and-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98a7d21e-7f1f-4a80-b301-7581803eb592 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 17:59:00 -0500 AI-driven advancements in electronic skin technology promise revolution in health monitoring and diagnostics
新研究表明空气质量影响想象力和创造力新加坡南洋理工大学（NTU Singapore）的科学家发现，办公室的空气质量可能会影响我们工作时的创造力水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/New-study-shows-air-quality-impacts-imagination-and-inventiveness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/New-study-shows-air-quality-impacts-imagination-and-inventiveness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f875311e-8446-4cf0-a2b1-b60e743542fc Tue, 19 Dec 2023 12:56:23 -0500 New study shows air quality impacts imagination and inventiveness
研究揭示了 p38a 蛋白隐藏的非活性形式p38a 蛋白是调节各种细胞功能的关键酶，在一些疾病中发挥着至关重要的作用，包括癌症、慢性炎症和神经退行性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Study-reveals-hidden-inactive-form-of-p38a- Protein.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Study-reveals-hidden-inactive-form-of-p38a- Protein.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13574431-de3d-4d52-9ad5-80e7a7dab465 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 12:49:30 -0500 Study reveals hidden inactive form of p38a protein
突破性的基因组编辑技术有望治疗腓骨肌萎缩症上个世纪的科学进步极大地改变了我们的世界。例如，遗传学世界打开了无数可能性的大门：增强人类能力、治愈疾病，甚至改变进化过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Groundwriting-genome-editing-technique-holds-promise-for-treating-Charcote28093Mariee28093Tooth-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Groundwriting-genome-editing-technique-holds-promise-for-treating-Charcote28093Mariee28093Tooth-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=312679dc-6576-4c58-a61b-fb7c0563bc03 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 12:42:50 -0500 Groundbreaking genome-editing technique holds promise for treating Charcot–Marie–Tooth disease
患者特异性肌肉模型为个性化神经肌肉治疗铺平道路迄今为止，科学家已鉴定出约 800 种不同的神经肌肉疾病。这些病症是由肌肉细胞、运动神经元和外周细胞相互作用的方式问题引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Patient-specific-muscle-models-pave-way-for-personalized-neuromuscular-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Patient-specific-muscle-models-pave-way-for-personalized-neuromuscular-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=350577c1-9ed5-47aa-b530-7c65b659387f Tue, 19 Dec 2023 12:36:04 -0500 Patient-specific muscle models pave way for personalized neuromuscular therapies
京都科学家绘制了焦虑症的双重打击基因簇焦虑症 (AD) 影响着全球超过 2.8 亿人，使其成为最常见的心理健康状况之一。从家族遗传来看，AD 具有遗传基础，患有一种 AD 亚型的人往往有另一种亚型，这表明存在共同的遗传基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Kyoto-scientists-map-double-whammy-gene-clusters-for-anxiety-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Kyoto-scientists-map-double-whammy-gene-clusters-for-anxiety-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae955a51-0a7f-4d52-abad-c97bbdde3891 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 12:24:45 -0500 Kyoto scientists map double whammy gene clusters for anxiety disorders
科学家设计的非致幻性迷幻疗法可能会加速对心理健康益处的研究研究人员发现了与迷幻潜能相关的 5-羟色胺 2A (5-HT2A) 受体 (5-HT2AR) 信号通路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Scientists-design-non-hallucinogenic-psychedelic-treatments-潜在-加速-研究-on-mental-health-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Scientists-design-non-hallucinogenic-psychedelic-treatments-潜在-加速-研究-on-mental-health-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1c4c809-c2e0-4c82-b0e3-e330c75a1033 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 09:04:00 -0500 Scientists design non-hallucinogenic psychedelic treatments potentially accelerating research on mental health benefits
